tags.name: cds-alert-actions
tags.description:
Web component alert actions to be used inside app-level alert.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert';
```

```html
<cds-app-alert>
    <cds-alert-content>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</cds-alert-content>
    <cds-alert-actions>
       <cds-button>Fix</cds-button>
    </cds-alert-actions>
</cds-app-alert>
```

tags.name: cds-alert-content
tags.description:
Web component alert content to be used inside alert.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert';
```

```html
<cds-alert>
    <cds-alert-content>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</cds-alert-content>
</cds-alert>

<cds-app-alert>
    <cds-alert-content>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</cds-alert-content>
    <cds-alert-actions>
       <cds-button>Fix</cds-button>
    </cds-alert-actions>
</cds-app-alert>
```

tags.name: cds-alert
tags.description:
Web component alerts.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/alert';
```

```html
<cds-alert>
    <cds-alert-content>This is an alert.</cds-alert-content>
</cds-alert>
```

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the overall height and width of the alert and icon based on value

attributes.name: closable
attributes.description: If false, the alert will not render the close button.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Sets the color of the alert from a predefined list of statuses

attributes.name: iconShape
attributes.description: Sets the icon shape to be used to override the default icon. The application must import the icon shape.

attributes.name: iconTitle
attributes.description: Sets the title attribute for the icon. This may need to be set especially if the component is using custom icon shape.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the overall height and width of the alert and icon based on value

properties.name: closable
properties.description: If false, the alert will not render the close button.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Sets the color of the alert from a predefined list of statuses

properties.name: iconShape
properties.description: Sets the icon shape to be used to override the default icon. The application must import the icon shape.

properties.name: iconTitle
properties.description: Sets the title attribute for the icon. This may need to be set especially if the component is using custom icon shape.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the alert. Usually will contain at least a <cds-alert-content> component.

tags.name: cds-badge
tags.description:
Badges provide a method to highlight a count of an element either next to it
or inside the element itself.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/badge';
```

```html
<cds-badge status="info">2</cds-badge>
```

attributes.name: color
attributes.description:
Sets the color of the badge from the following predefined list of choices:
'gray', 'purple', 'blue', 'orange', 'light-blue'

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Sets the color of the badge from the following predefined list of statuses:
'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'

properties.name: color
properties.description:
Sets the color of the badge from the following predefined list of choices:
'gray', 'purple', 'blue', 'orange', 'light-blue'

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Sets the color of the badge from the following predefined list of statuses:
'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the badge

tags.name: cds-button
tags.description:
Buttons allow an application to communicate action and direct user intent.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/button';
```

```html
<cds-button>submit</cds-button>
```

attributes.name: action
attributes.description:
Define the type of action the button triggers

- `solid`: buttons direct the user’s attention to the primary action the application is suggesting that the user take.
- `outline`: buttons indicate secondary actions that compliments a primary action or reduces visual noise when there are many actions on the page.
- `flat`: buttons are used as tertiary buttons. Can also be used inline because they are different from content in style and recognizable as buttons alongside content.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Sets the color of the button to match the following string statuses

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Sets the overall height and width of the button based on the following string values:

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Sets if the button should be full width with display block

attributes.name: loadingState
attributes.description:
Changes the button content based on the value passed.

- `default`: shows the content of the button
- `loading`: disables the button and shows a spinner inside the button
- `success`: disables the button and shows a check mark inside the button; auto-triggers to change back to DEFAULT state after 1000 ms
- `error`: shows the content of the button (in the context of application, this state is usually entered from a LOADING state. the application should show appropriate error message)

properties.name: action
properties.description:
Define the type of action the button triggers

- `solid`: buttons direct the user’s attention to the primary action the application is suggesting that the user take.
- `outline`: buttons indicate secondary actions that compliments a primary action or reduces visual noise when there are many actions on the page.
- `flat`: buttons are used as tertiary buttons. Can also be used inline because they are different from content in style and recognizable as buttons alongside content.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Sets the color of the button to match the following string statuses

properties.name: size
properties.description: Sets the overall height and width of the button based on the following string values:

properties.name: block
properties.description: Sets if the button should be full width with display block

properties.name: loadingState
properties.description:
Changes the button content based on the value passed.

- `default`: shows the content of the button
- `loading`: disables the button and shows a spinner inside the button
- `success`: disables the button and shows a check mark inside the button; auto-triggers to change back to DEFAULT state after 1000 ms
- `error`: shows the content of the button (in the context of application, this state is usually entered from a LOADING state. the application should show appropriate error message)

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the button

tags.name: cds-icon

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Apply numerical width-height or a t-shirt-sized CSS classname

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility.

attributes.name: dir
attributes.deprecatedMessage:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

Deprecated in 3.0. Use `direction` instead. `dir` will be removed in 4.0!

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

attributes.name: flip
attributes.description:
Takes an orientation value (horizontal|vertical) that reverses the orientation of the
icon vertically or horizontally using the strings: 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

attributes.name: solid
attributes.description: Displays most icons in their "filled" version if set to `true`.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Changes color of icon fills and outlines to a color determined by the following
list of statuses: 'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger', 'highlight'

attributes.name: inverse
attributes.description:
Inverts color of icon fills and outlines if `true`.
Useful for displaying icons on a dark background.

attributes.name: badge
attributes.description:
Attribute: `badge`
Sets the color of the icon decoration that appears in the top-right corner
of the glyph. The icon decoration is derived from the following predefined types.

The color of the badge can change according to the following
list of statuses:
'info'  -> blue dot
'success' -> green dot
'warning' -> yellow dot
'danger' -> red dot
'inherit' -> dot inherits color of full icon glyph
'warning-triangle' -> yellow triangle
'inherit-triangle' -> triangle inherits color of full icon glyph
unrecognized value, empty string, or true -> red dot

By default, the badge displays a 'danger' dot (a red-colored dot).

Setting the badge to 'null' removes the attribute from the DOM.

properties.name: shape
properties.description:
Changes the svg glyph displayed in the icon component. Defaults to the 'unknown' icon if
the specified icon cannot be found in the icon registry.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Apply numerical width-height or a t-shirt-sized CSS classname

properties.name: title
properties.description: If present, customizes the aria-label for the icon for accessibility.

properties.name: dir
properties.deprecatedMessage:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

Deprecated in 3.0. Use `direction` instead. `dir` will be removed in 4.0!

properties.name: direction
properties.description:
Takes a directional value (up|down|left|right) that rotates the icon 90° with the
top of the icon pointing in the specified direction.

properties.name: flip
properties.description:
Takes an orientation value (horizontal|vertical) that reverses the orientation of the
icon vertically or horizontally using the strings: 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

properties.name: solid
properties.description: Displays most icons in their "filled" version if set to `true`.

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Changes color of icon fills and outlines to a color determined by the following
list of statuses: 'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger', 'highlight'

properties.name: inverse
properties.description:
Inverts color of icon fills and outlines if `true`.
Useful for displaying icons on a dark background.

properties.name: badge
properties.description:
Attribute: `badge`
Sets the color of the icon decoration that appears in the top-right corner
of the glyph. The icon decoration is derived from the following predefined types.

The color of the badge can change according to the following
list of statuses:
'info'  -> blue dot
'success' -> green dot
'warning' -> yellow dot
'danger' -> red dot
'inherit' -> dot inherits color of full icon glyph
'warning-triangle' -> yellow triangle
'inherit-triangle' -> triangle inherits color of full icon glyph
unrecognized value, empty string, or true -> red dot

By default, the badge displays a 'danger' dot (a red-colored dot).

Setting the badge to 'null' removes the attribute from the DOM.

tags.name: cds-tag
tags.description:
Tags show concise metadata in a compact format.
Tags are visually styled to differentiate them from buttons.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/tag';
```

```html
<cds-tag status="info">Info</cds-tag>
```

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from the following predefined list of statuses:
'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from a predefined list of choices

properties.name: status
properties.description:
Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from the following predefined list of statuses:
'info', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'

properties.name: color
properties.description: Sets the color of the tag (and badge if present) from a predefined list of choices

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content slot for inside the tag

tags.name: cds-test-dropdown
tags.description:
Dropdown, example test component. Do not use in production.

```typescript
import '@clr/core/test-dropdown';
```

```html
<cds-test-dropdown title="click me!">
   Hello World
</cds-test-dropdown>
```

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Set open to open or close the dropdown

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Set the dropdown button text

properties.name: open
properties.description: Set open to open or close the dropdown

properties.name: title
properties.description: Set the dropdown button text

events.name: openChange
events.description: notify open state change of dropdown
